description: Try our easy to follow Pampas Fruit Bowl Crumble Tart  recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pampas Fruit Bowl Crumble Tart Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 20 minutes or until pastry is puffed, golden and cooked through. To serve, dust with icing sugar and top with double cream.
